location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:134 x 189 mmCondition:The print is in good condition with minor surface dirt throughout.Foliation:‘35’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View of a narrow street in Baghdad, with a woman carrying an infant in the foreground; another woman wearing black stands against the same wall in the background, while in the far distance other figures can be seen. The buildings on either side of the street are made of brick and feature projecting mashrabiyyas of wood and metal.Inscriptions:Ink, below image: 'View in Bagdad.'Pencil, alongside image at lower right: ‘35’; ‘13’
